title: Java Level 10 â€” Problem Solving Mix
concept: Combining arrays, loops, methods, recursion and basic algorithms.

challenges.title: Second Largest Element
challenges.description: Given n and an array of n integers (n >= 2), print the second largest distinct element. If it does not exist (all equal), print -1.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.title: Kadane Maximum Subarray Sum
challenges.description: Given n and an array, find the maximum subarray sum using Kadane's algorithm or any O(n) method.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.title: Rotate Array Right
challenges.description: Given n, an array of n integers, and k, rotate the array to the right by k positions and print the result.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers. Third line: k.

challenges.title: Matrix Diagonal Sum
challenges.description: Given n and an n x n matrix, print the sum of its main diagonal elements.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Next n lines: n integers each.

challenges.title: Transpose of Matrix
challenges.description: Given n and m and an n x m matrix, print its transpose (m x n).
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n m. Next n lines: m integers each.
challenges.outputDescription: m lines, each with n integers.

challenges.title: Valid Parentheses
challenges.description: Given a string consisting of only '(' and ')', check if it is a valid parentheses sequence. Use stack logic. Print YES or NO.

challenges.title: Longest Word in a Sentence
challenges.description: Given a line of text, find the longest word (max length). If there are multiple, print the first one.
challenges.inputDescription: Single line of text with words separated by spaces.
examples:
Input:
I love programming

Output:
programming

challenges.title: Substring Search
challenges.description: Given two strings text and pattern, print the index of the first occurrence of pattern in text, or -1 if not found. Use 0-based indexing.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: text. Second line: pattern.

challenges.title: Matrix Search
challenges.description: Given n, m and an n x m matrix, and an integer x, check if x appears in the matrix. Print YES or NO.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n m. Next n lines: m integers each. Last line: x.
challenges.outputDescription: YES if x appears, else NO.

challenges.title: Spiral Print Matrix
challenges.description: Given n, m and a matrix, print its elements in spiral order (clockwise), all in one line separated by spaces.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n m. Next n lines: m integers each.
challenges.outputDescription: One line: elements in spiral order.
